nodes.text: Fake It Till You Make It

"Fake It Till You Make It" is a short story that was published in the 2020 anthology book From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back. It was written by Cavan Scott and focuses on the smuggler Jaxxon T. Tumperakki. The audiobook version of the story was read by Sean Kenin Elias-Reyes.
